source.33d57bf3:
![image.png](attachment:image.png)

we can see that the WIT history price is not a simple Time Series, because it does not has obvious periodicity
the price go straight down in 2008 (the financial crisis) and 2015 (US shale?) and 2020 (COVID)
so most of data in the price history may doesn't make much sense for helping predicting the WIT price in 2020 with COVID-19
source.8c85c0ca:
